channel.title: Enso II - Next Generation RSPS [2011 RS BASED]
channel.description:
[b]Enso II - The Next Generation RSPS[/b] [u]Details[/u] Revision: 667 Cache: 667 Framework: Matrix [i] Developers[/i] Fuzen Seth Josh' [u]About us[/u] Original Enso was filled out with bugs and glitches, these issues are already fixed. Our goal here is to create the best possible economic RSPS server, Enso is based on the 2011 re-make with world-wide content. This is not a re-make though, this is Enso! Enso is been already very long in the development but now it will be even more. Enso will be totally outstanding RSPS. Enso has already some insane content such as quest systems with actual quest rewards, players has ability of purchasing untradeable items and gain boosts in-game. [u]Game Updates[/u]
18.11.2013 -NPC Transform (Ape a Toll by using Monkey greegree, all of them added without glitches.) -Cannot combat, eat, drink while being in a form. -Checks done trought walking packet to make have minimal amount of bugs, if any. -Ape a Toll dungeon complete (Camerashake, hits, safespots, monkey 2x spawning everything) 17.11.2013 Part 2 -Added Skeleton Monkeys (You kill one, two spawns after) -Added Skeleton monkey combatscript. -Added Daero 100% dialogue same as it was in RS, this includes travelling also which is same too. 17.11.2013 -Overload fixes (If player is overloaded and player would drink Saradomin brew the player won't lose the overloaded stats.) -Woodcutting fixes. -Bird nests -Mining random gem chance -Varrock museum display cases under work now. (For kudos system) -More completed price checker, loads from GE Prices the price data. -Godwars killcount. -Added new mapdatas. -Emote unlock system (You unlock emotes by completing quests / random events). -Cooking delay, burn chance fixes. -Achievement system is now completed. 9.11.2013 -Nearly finished loyalty shop, only need to do purchasing with points. -Fixed world-wide bugs. -Fixed a part from quest. 8.11.2013 (2) -Started christmas event. 8.11.2013 -Improved alching. -Improved the Dwarf's multi cannon (if it decay you can have it back). -World wide musician resting. -World wide fillables. -Character customizing overlay (1028) fully added. 7.11.2013 -Fishing skill more content (Barbarian fishing) - Bug fixes around map
[u]Media[/u] [img]http://puu.sh/5ml15.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5ml6D.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5l2Id.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5l2nW.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5kXot.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5kXkY.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5cY3Q.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c71M.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c72B.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c70S.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c6Zy.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c6WT.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5kXGr.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5bylk.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5byRS.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5byeP.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/5bxbP.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5bxzF.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5bxEJ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5bxVl.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5by9Y.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5byi7.jpg[/img]

item.title: Enso II - Next Generation RSPS [2011 RS BASED]
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:


I have added full charge and the player-in-form system is more complete. Player cannot drink, eat, use prayer and preform emotes while in a form.

While I have made charge i have added new file called MagicAbility to handle special spells like charge.

Thanks everyone for support! more to come.

Read full topic

item.title: Enso II - Next Generation RSPS [2011 RS BASED]
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Stealmojo:

That trailer was just… AWESOME!

Glad to hear you like it!

I have been working more on random events. Contains real dialogues as well.

I’ve work the group system, nearly ready to use.

Started the Bounty Hunter which will be wilderness -based most likely.

I want to thank everyone by supporting Enso 2!

Read full topic

[quote=“Soulcist, post:17, topic:535330”][quote author=MentiosRSPS link=topic=654136.msg4384395#msg4384395 date=1384752589]

Grammar.

I know theres grammar mistakes, specially in quests. I will be hiring someone to fix them all once Enso will go to that high stage.
[/quote]
Will you be releasing a BETA for selected people or overall? If selected, I would love to test it out.[/quote]

We will be giving out beta keys.

Enso II Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OpIhppnOAs8

item.title: Enso II - Next Generation RSPS [2011 RS BASED]
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

[quote=“Zeanr, post:10, topic:535330”][quote author=MentiosRSPS link=topic=654136.msg4382345#msg4382345 date=1383984300]

This looks quite amazing, I would love to play this.

[center]Thanks for support, thanks for everyone! I have finished nearly Loyalty Programme of Enso.

[/center]
[/quote]

I’m not experienced with java at all but the text in the loyalty boxes should be aligned to the center. Would look much better![/quote]

You sure? The cache is real 667 so it’s also old. But I will work on this more though. I want to apologize that I have been un-active. Currently working hard irl just got money on payday and bought a new mouse and headset.

Read full topic

item.title: Enso II - Next Generation RSPS [2011 RS BASED]
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Enso II - The Next Generation RSPS

Details
Revision: 667
Cache: 667
Framework: Matrix


Developers
Fuzen Seth
Josh’

About us
Original Enso was filled out with bugs and glitches, these issues are already fixed. Our goal here is to create the best possible economic RSPS server, Enso is based on the 2011 re-make with world-wide content. This is not a re-make though, this is Enso! Enso is been already very long in the development but now it will be even more. Enso will be totally outstanding RSPS. Enso has already some insane content such as quest systems with actual quest rewards, players has ability of purchasing untradeable items and gain boosts in-game.

Game Updates

18.11.2013 -NPC Transform (Ape a Toll by using Monkey greegree, all of them added without glitches.) -Cannot combat, eat, drink while being in a form. -Checks done trought walking packet to make have minimal amount of bugs, if any. -Ape a Toll dungeon complete (Camerashake, hits, safespots, monkey 2x spawning everything)

17.11.2013 Part 2
-Added Skeleton Monkeys (You kill one, two spawns after)
-Added Skeleton monkey combatscript.
-Added Daero 100% dialogue same as it was in RS, this includes travelling also which is same too.
17.11.2013
-Overload fixes (If player is overloaded and player would drink Saradomin brew the player won’t lose the overloaded stats.)
-Woodcutting fixes.
-Bird nests
-Mining random gem chance
-Varrock museum display cases under work now. (For kudos system)
-More completed price checker, loads from GE Prices the price data.
-Godwars killcount.
-Added new mapdatas.
-Emote unlock system (You unlock emotes by completing quests / random events).
-Cooking delay, burn chance fixes.
-Achievement system is now completed.

9.11.2013
-Nearly finished loyalty shop, only need to do purchasing with points.
-Fixed world-wide bugs.
-Fixed a part from quest.

8.11.2013 (2)
-Started christmas event.
8.11.2013
-Improved alching.
-Improved the Dwarf’s multi cannon (if it decay you can have it back).
-World wide musician resting.
-World wide fillables.
-Character customizing overlay (1028) fully added.
7.11.2013
-Fishing skill more content (Barbarian fishing)

  • Bug fixes around map

Media





















Read full topic
item.source: Enso II - Next Generation RSPS [2011 RS BASED]
